scenario.name: MESSAGE
scenario.send:
MESSAGE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 MESSAGE Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Content-Type: text/plain Content-Length: [len]
